title: New year, new royal portrait released
description: With the new year comes a new royal portrait.

title: He was born without fingers. Watch his priceless reaction to gift
description: An 11-year-old boy born without fingers received 3D printed hands and can grip and hold things for the first time.

title: Lessons from a high-powered, 64-year-old attorney's first brush with Alzheimer's disease
description: A high-powered, 64-year-old attorney came to my office because he felt his memory was failing. He forgot clients' names in mid-conversation and was losing track of important details at work. Although he seemed completely fine on my initial neurological examination, he underwent a several hours-long neurocognitive evaluation, the best way to evaluate cognition in high functioning people.

title: This is the bombshell Trump's team didn't want revealed
description:
• New York Times: Trump administration withholds emails on Ukraine aid
• Burnett: Trump didn't want anyone to see this
• Analysis: New Ukraine revelations turn up heat on Senate trial showdown

title: 'Just be quiet': Retired general responds to senator
description: Retired Major General James "Spider" Marks says Sen. Chris Murphy (D-CT) should "just be quiet" after Murphy criticized President Trump's decision to carry out a strike which led to the death of top Iranian General Qasem Soleimani.

title: Instagram filter matching Robin Williams' daughter to his 'Aladdin' character is what we all need right now
description: Zelda Williams laugh says it all.

title: Here's how much the autoworkers strike hurt GM
description: People kept buying Chevys, Buicks, GMC trucks and Cadillacs during the autoworkers' 40-day strike last quarter. But GM didn't walk away unscathed: it sold 25% fewer vehicles to dealerships in the last three months of the year.

title: Critics takes a swing at Trump's golf game
description: Trump gets needled for so much golfing. Jeanne Moos reports the President spent 1 of every 5 days at a golf club.

title: 'US won't be able to deal with potential fallout'
description: The killing of Qasem Soleimani, one of the most powerful men in Iran, is a dramatic escalation of an already dangerous situation in the Middle East, threatening to trigger violence from the Gulf to the shores of the Mediterranean.

title: How Soleimani used asymmetric warfare against Iran's enemies
description: CNN's Nick Paton Walsh explains how Iran's top general Qasem Soleimani used asymmetric warfare against the country's enemies and their allies.

title: Secretary of State Pompeo brushes off French criticism of Soleimani killing
description: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo responds to a French official's statement that the world is a less safe place following the US killing of Iranian commander Qasem Soleimani. Pomepo urged that the American airstrike would make life better for the region.

title: Turkish private jet company says rogue employee helped Carlos Ghosn flee Japan
description: A Turkish company that charters private jets says a rogue employee helped fugitive auto executive Carlos Ghosn escape from Japan to Lebanon.

title: Justin Bieber drops long-awaited music with 'Yummy'
description: After more than four years of waiting, the Beliebers have been blessed with new music.

title: 10 of the best Caribbean islands to visit
description: With hundreds of Caribbean islands to choose from, it can be daunting to decide on a destination in this sun-splashed region.

title: Zlatan Ibrahimović: 'The duel with Cristiano Ronaldo will be exciting,' says Swedish star
description: He might be 38 and in the twilight of his career, but Zlatan Ibrahimovic has few peers when it comes to chutzpah.

title: Liverpool breaking records and opponents' resolve
description: A New Year, but the same relentless, history-making Liverpool.

title: Quadrantid meteor shower, first of the new year, peaks this weekend
description: The new year begins with the peak of the Quadrantid meteor shower on Saturday, one of the best annual shows in the night sky, according to NASA. Dark skies should allow for a nice look at the bright shower in the early morning hours of January 4.

title: Iran promised retaliation, and one place is particularly vulnerable
description: Could conflict in the Middle East disrupt global oil supplies? That risk is back in focus after a US strike in Baghdad killed Qasem Soleimani, a top Iranian general.

title: 18 killed in Sudanese military plane crash
description: Four children were among those killed after a military plane crashed a few minutes after takeoff in the Sudanese town of El Geneina, a military spokesman said according to a state media outlet.

title: UK lawmaker Layla Moran reveals she is pansexual
description: A UK lawmaker has revealed that she is pansexual and in a relationship with a woman.

title: See aftermath of airstrike that killed Iranian commander
description: Qasem Soleimani, the head of the Iranian Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps (IRGC) Quds Force unit, was killed in an airstrike at Baghdad airport. The deputy head of Iraqi Popular Mobilization Forces (PMF), an Iran-backed paramilitary force, was also killed.

title: Former South Korean prime minister among 29 politicians charged over mass brawl
description: A former South Korean prime minister is one of 29 politicians charged over a mass brawl at the country's National Assembly last year that saw one lawmaker locked in his office for more than six hours.

title: Who was Soleimani, the Iranian commander killed by a US airstrike?
description: Qasem Soleimani, who was killed by a US airstrike ordered by President Donald Trump at Baghdad International Airport on Friday, was hailed as a hero in Iran -- brave, charismatic and beloved by the troops.

title: Trump orders killing of Soleimani as US carries out airport strike in major escalation
Tearful woman refuses to shake prime minister's hand
description: Australia's Prime Minister Scott Morrison was heckled by residents living in the bushfire danger zone who were angry with the government's response to the fires.

title: There's talk of a new Cold War. But China is not the Soviet Union
description: In the battle for global dominance, all eyes are on China and the United States.

title: Australian military embark on rescue missions as deadly wildfires threaten to burn towns to the ground
description: Australian authorities are launching naval and air rescue operations along the country's southeast coast as deadly wildfires intensify, stranding residents and tourists in towns that may be wiped out by Saturday.

title: And the headliners for Coachella 2020 are...
description: Rage Against the Machine, Travis Scott and Frank Ocean will headline the Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival 2020.

title: New Ukraine revelations turn up heat on Senate trial showdown
description: New evidence showing Donald Trump's direct role in pressuring Ukraine for political favors is dialing up the heat as Republicans launch their New Year push to shield the President in a swift Senate impeachment trial.

title: From Berlin to the West Bank -- why we build walls
description: People have always built walls. They are a human story told with metal and stone.

title: Iranian foreign minister: Airstrike 'dangerous and foolish'
description: Iranian Foreign Minister Javad Zarif tweeted that the US airstrike that killed Qasem Soleimani, the commander of Iran's Quds Forces,  is a "dangerous and foolish escalation."

title: Dr. Phil's son Jordan McGraw is selling his Beverly Hills home and it's not what you may expect
description: Custom art featuring guns and bear figurines abound.

title: Australian magpie mimics emergency sirens as deadly fires rage
description: A songbird mimicking the sounds of emergency sirens has been caught on video in southeast Australia, as firefighters battle deadly wildfires in the region.

title: Oil prices jump after Iran military leader killed in US strike
description: Oil prices pulled higher Friday morning after a top Iranian general was killed in a US airstrike at Baghdad's airport ordered by President Donald Trump.

title: 'Surviving R. Kelly Part II' reignites debate and pain
description: The first two episodes of "Surviving R. Kelly Part II: The Reckoning" premiered Thursday night and much like the original docuseries, there were plenty of tears.

title: Killing of Soleimani is hugely significant
description: The significance of Thursday's US strike against Qasem Soleimani cannot be overstated because he ran Iran's military operations across the Middle East.

title: Fareed: Difficult to convey how revered Soleimani is in Iran
description: CNN's Fareed Zakaria responds after the commander of Iran's Quds Force, Qasem Soleimani, and a senior official in Iraq's paramilitary forces were killed by "shelling" targeting their vehicle at Baghdad International Airport, Iraqi state television reported.

title: Chicago lauds homicide decline as other US cities combat murders
description: As Chicago officials laud a significant drop in homicides for the third straight year, other US cities enter 2020 combating rising murder rates.

title: From the 'Iliad' to 'Circe': Culture's enduring fascination with the myths of Troy
description: The story of the epic war fought over a woman has been told many times. It now lies at the heart of an ongoing exhibition at the British Museum.

title: Erin Burnett: Trump didn't want anyone to see this
description: CNN's Erin Burnett reacts to unredacted documents reviewed by Just Security which purport to show that the order to freeze military aid to Ukraine came directly from President Trump.

title: Man missing in Grand Canyon National Park for nearly two weeks found alive
description: A Texas man reported missing on December 22 was found alive in Grand Canyon National Park on Thursday, according to the National Park Service.
